name: HatshepsutTalk
_source: s;Simon;I remember you. From Port Hull?
s;Hatshepsut;I briefly stopped there, yes.|I sense your adventures have taken you many places.
s;Simon;We are a long way from that tavern.|Still, I remember you saying it's an ill omen for two blessed to be together.
s;Hatshepsut;Perhaps...{w} this land has not been kind to me.|Perhaps it is time for old omens to be cast aside.
s;Hatshepsut;So long as it suits me.
s;Simon;I am Simon Verstadt, lord of a demense to the south of here.
s;Hatshepsut;And I am Hatshepsut, awoken by Horus.|May our enemies rue our alliance.
